publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1691.1 Mary Mulligan: Strategy for Play—As an amendment to motion (S3M-1691) in the name of Robert Brown, leave out from "and urges" to end and insert "including a plan for Scotland’s playgrounds which should be developed in conjunction with organisations such as the Forestry Commission and Greenspace Scotland to create and open up more green space to give children new and exciting places to play, and urges the Scottish Government to fulfil its manifesto pledge to develop a play strategy for Scotland’s children and young people." Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S3M-1691.1 Mary Mulligan: Strategy for Play—As an amendment to motion (S3M-1691) in the name of Robert Brown, leave out from "and urges" to end and insert "including a plan for Scotland’s playgrounds which should be developed in conjunction with organisations such as the Forestry Commission and Greenspace Scotland to create and open up more green space to give children new and exciting places to play, and urges the Scottish Government to fulfil its manifesto pledge to develop a play strategy for Scotland’s children and young people."
S3M-1691.1 Strategy for Play (lodged on 17 April 2008) Claire Baker*
S3M-1691.1 Strategy for Play (lodged on 17 April 2008) George Foulkes*
